# ceph Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `insecure` (Boolean) Whether to skip TLS verification
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for authentication
- `url` (String) The Ceph Dashboard URL (e.g., https://ceph-dashboard.example.com:8443)
- `username` (String, Sensitive) The username for authentication
